description:
Hello and welcome to this course!

Thanks for stopping by. This course is aimed to give you the skills you need to go ahead and manage your startup software project. A lot of people struggle to manage their project and sometimes have a lot of difficulties to manage their startup project. 
In this course, we will cover:

  • How to validate your idea before starting your project
  • How to collect requirement for your project and validate them
  • How to reflect your requirement into software design
  • How to Estimate the time and cost for your project
  • How to hire freelancers and where to find them
  • How to follow your project progress and make sure that everything is going as planned


And also, there is a bonus section for you to how promote your project and why you should have a mailing list.

Also, if you join this course, you will get help and support from me in the course discussion so post there your question or problem.
title: Manage Your Tech Startup Project
